unit: Unit 8 | Inference for Categorical Data: Chi-Square
title: ${\chi}^{2}$: High School Numbers
question_text: Freshmen, sophomores, juniors, and seniors at a high school were asked to pick a number from $0$ to $9$ .  A chi-square test was conducted to determine whether the proportion of numbers picked were the same  across grade levels. How many degrees of freedom should the ${\chi}^{2}$ test have?
